survey_name: Post-Event Attendee Feedback Survey for Corporate Training Workshops
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of corporate training workshops to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall content of the workshop?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall content of the workshop?

questions.question_text: Which topics covered in the workshop were most valuable to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse attendee preferences.

script.question_text: Which topics covered in the workshop were most valuable to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional topics would you like to see covered in future workshops?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional topics would you like to see covered in future workshops?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the facilitator's knowledge and presentation skills?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with Q1.

script.question_text: How would you rate the facilitator's knowledge and presentation skills?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this workshop to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe options for quick feedback.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this workshop to a colleague?
